name: Adventures of Granzard
description:
Adventures of Granzard is a puzzle platformer where you can control time 

It was made for the Goedware Game jam #7 in 8 days

In this game,  you play as a sorcerer named Granzard who has time control powers. He can hit enemies with his orbs to reverse the flow of time for them. one day, Granzard gets sucked into an interdimensional portal leading him to multiple alternate worlds. Your job is to guide Granzard as he makes his way through these mysterious worlds!
